text: Yeah it's a good question. At the time, I had a lot of people saying "why are you not going on to study Art at university and/or do a Foundation degree in art", but really I had decided that I loved art as a hobby, but I saw more money in business and banking so wanted to nail that first. I thought I could always come back to art in the future.

Having said that, I don't really do art anymore, but I'm a much more comfortably situation financially than I might have been had I pursued a career in Art ... but to be honest I was so driven and determined to make a career for myself that I probably could have made a career in Art work!!

Do you see yourself as a driven person? It's a good thing to reflect on i.e. whether you think you'll put in the hours and energy that some of the career routes might take. Some people don't want to and that's fine too. They will just have a 9-5pm job most likely
I see myself as a driven person but not to the point where the thing that I want becomes my whole life. I like to keep my options open.
